item.title: [Python] Calculation drill python (extension)
item.description: This time, I will extend the function of "[Calculation drill python](https://qiita.com/banana19980702/items/d8ff4c1aaf5cbe8afc2a)" I wrote last time. The functions to add are as follows. ‥ #Extension ・Add problem number ・Increased the number of questions to 100 First, we will add the problem number. Since the code becomes complicated here, I will summarize the process of outputting the question and answer in the form of a function. The code is as follows.
